short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collate and export contacts from LinkedIn search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop spending hours prospecting in LinkedIn Sales Navigator!

Collater is the simplest way for salespeople and entrepreneurs to export leads on LinkedIn. The extension automatically iterates through your search results and transforms the lead data into a bulk CSV download.

We've designed the extension to be minimalist, so it can fit with your existing lead generation workflowsâ€”no bells or whistles, no suspicious downloads, no risky and opaque cloud operations.

Collater just generates a CSV lead list that you can plug into your CRM or marketing tool, so you can get back to the tasks that matter.

Features:

âœ… Automatically click through multiple pages of search results
âœ… Flexibly add email addresses and contact metadata
âœ… Quickly compile and download leads as CSV
âœ… Keep your LinkedIn account safe by simulating real prospecting workflows
